plot: An overlooked math teacher decides to win the lottery by using his professional expertise to calculate the winning numbers, but will this decision lead to happiness?
title: The Numbers
plot_es: An overlooked math teacher decides to win the lottery by using his professional expertise to calculate the winning numbers, but will this decision lead to happiness?
plot_en: An overlooked math teacher decides to win the lottery by using his professional expertise to calculate the winning numbers, but will this decision lead to happiness?
